lead_paragraph: After escaping a blanket ban from the Olympics, Russia was kicked out of the upcoming Paralympics on Sunday as the ultimate punishment for the state running a doping operation that polluted sports by prioritizing "medals over morals."

headline.print_headline: Entire Russian Team Banned From Competing in Rio Paralympics
headline.main: Entire Russian Team Banned From Competing in Rio Paralympics
